Unless circumstances make the swift brick or similar product impractical, this system should be chosen over external nest boxes. For minor developments, the minimum number of swift boxes required on residential development is three, or two per residential unit, whichever is greater (noting it is not necessary that two boxes are placed on each unit, but that the equivalent number should be applied across the development). For major developments specific requirements will be recommended by the ecology advisor. The requirement will be secured by attaching a condition to planning consents. 328 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES
